::Spears::

She was almost under the chips total control.  Her mind went wild and 
in a million directions at once.  She had her orders from Prebon, 
which she would obey completely.  But her head went spinning and she 
was falling for Prebon.  She felt herself care for Striker less and 
less.  She now was wanting Prebon, and the longer the chip was on 
her, the more she wanted him.  She knew somewhere in the back of her 
mind, that it was worth giving everthing up, if that Striker would 
live.

She kissed Prebon again. "Thank you master Prebon." She kissed him 
again.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon was surprised when Spears kissed him. The chip was having 
more 
> of an effect on her than it did not anyone. Or maybe she was trying 
> to manipulate him within the boundries of the chip. He'll play it 
> out. Mutiny would be punished later.
> 
> "I'll have to have some of his memories erased, because he knows 
our 
> plans. But I might let some of his more painful memories left." He 
> kissed Spears tenderly back and lept escorting her out.
